title: I know i should not take the twitch chat toxic statements into consideration but..
body:
This NA > EU  or EU > NA or KR > NA  shit or whatever , who started it ? 

How do anybody judge a whole region full of  hundreds of thousands of players if not millions  by a pro team that loses  2 games  against people at about the same level ? Isn't the pro play diffirent from the regular play AKA solo queue ?


I am not an EU  or KR fanboy or whatever , i just watch pro play for fun for the great things that pro playres does , it just sickens me when people who come to watch.. No, to spam the chat with dumb things like '' KR > NA LUL ''.

replies.body: You're better off ignoring it, it's just little kids who all suck at the game trying to make themselves feel better.

It's been pretty much a factor for the last 7 or so years!    
LCK - Wins 
LPL- Consistent 
EU- The better western region 
LMS - Surprising wins
NA - Sucks 

The whole LCK > NA etc is pretty much just a fact statement, if you don't like the chat in any stream etc, don't pay attention to it or just close the tab and watch the stream of Worlds etc on youtube.
